name: @safari-lib/fastify-boilerplate
author: BenoitSafari
description: Fastify boilerplate using, Fastify, Postgres and Docker

scripts.docker:test: docker exec fastify_dev npm run test
scripts.docker:test:watch: docker exec fastify_dev npm run test:watch
scripts.docker:prisma:generate: docker exec fastify_dev npx prisma generate
scripts.docker:prisma:migrate:dev: docker exec fastify_dev npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.docker:prisma:studio: docker exec fastify_dev npx prisma studio -p 5555
scripts.docker:run:db: docker run -d -e POSTGRES_USER=postgres_user -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=postgres_password -e POSTGRES_DB=postgres_db --network local_dev -p 5432:5432 -v database:/var/lib/postgresql/data --name pg_dev postgres:latest
scripts.docker:init: npm run docker:build:network && npm run docker:build:dev && npm run docker:run:db && npm run docker:run:dev
